caption.center: STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA v. RICHARD MICHAEL HARLEY.

opinion.attorneys:
Kevin P. Bradley, Durham, for Richard M. Harley.
Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Belinda J. Foster, District Attorney, for State of NC.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 27th day of March 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:
Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006.
